items.name: Watch the Video (content page)
items.text: Watch the video and be ready to answer questions.

items.name: Answer the question I (multichoice)
items.text: What does Ernie decide to do after Bert tells him not to eat cookies in bed?
items.text1: Ernie decides to stop eating cookies altogether.
items.text2: Ernie decides to eat cookies in Bert's bed instead.
items.text3: Ernie decides to eat cookies in the kitchen.
items.text4: Ernie decides to eat cookies in the morning.

items.name: Answer the question II (multichoice + image)
items.text: Why does Bert tell Ernie not to eat cookies in bed?
items.text2: Because Ernie might get crumbs in his pajamas and feel itchy.
items.text3: Because Ernie might wake up Bert.
items.text4: Because Ernie might drop the cookies on the floor.

items.name: Answer the question III (multiaudio)
items.instructions: Choose the correct answer. Use the mic to read it aloud.
items.text: What does Ernie do after agreeing not to eat cookies in his own bed?
items.tts: What does Ernie do after agreeing not to eat cookies in his own bed?
items.text2: He eats cookies in Bert's bed instead.
items.text3: He goes to the kitchen to eat cookies.
items.text4: He decides to go to sleep without eating cookies.

items.name: Say the Sentences (listen and speak)
items.instructions: Listen and respond to the sentences you hear.
sentences: Ernie and Bert are in bed.
Bert worries about crumbs in bed.
Ernie moves to Bert's bed to eat.

items.name: Speak the words (speechcards)
items.text: Speak the phrases on the cards
sentences: Ernie and Bert are in bed.
Bert worries about crumbs in bed.
Ernie moves to Bert's bed to eat.

items.name: Type what you hear (dictation)
sentences: Ernie and Bert are in bed.
Bert worries about crumbs in bed.
Ernie moves to Bert's bed to eat.
